io.polestar.api

Interface IPolestarAPI

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IPolestarContext

    public interface IPolestarAPI
    Extended context for Polestar scripts to make common functions more convenient

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

        java.lang.Object getSensorValue(java.lang.String aSensorId)
                         throws org.netkernel.layer0.nkf.NKFException
        Get the current value of a sensor
        Parameters:
        aSensorId - the sensor to get the value of
        Throws:
        org.netkernel.layer0.nkf.NKFException - if sensor doesn't exist

      • getSensorError

        java.lang.String getSensorError(java.lang.String aSensorId)
                         throws org.netkernel.layer0.nkf.NKFException
        Get the current error of a sensor
        Parameters:
        aSensorId - the sensor to get the error for
        Returns:
        null if no error is current for sensor or a java.lang.String error message
        Throws:
        org.netkernel.layer0.nkf.NKFException - if sensor doesn't exist

      • getSensorLastModified

        java.lang.Long getSensorLastModified(java.lang.String aSensorId)
                              throws org.netkernel.layer0.nkf.NKFException
        Get the time the sensor was last modified
        Parameters:
        aSensorId - the sensor to get the error for
        Returns:
        null if no sensor never modified otherwise milliseconds from datum as System.currentTimeMillis()
        Throws:
        org.netkernel.layer0.nkf.NKFException - if sensor doesn't exist

      • getSensorLastUpdated

        java.lang.Long getSensorLastUpdated(java.lang.String aSensorId)
                             throws org.netkernel.layer0.nkf.NKFException
        Get the time the sensor was last updated (even if not modified)
        Parameters:
        aSensorId - the sensor to get the error for
        Returns:
        null if no sensor never updated otherwise milliseconds from datum as System.currentTimeMillis()
        Throws:
        org.netkernel.layer0.nkf.NKFException - if sensor doesn't exist

                    java.lang.String aError)
             throws org.netkernel.layer0.nkf.NKFException
        Set or clear an error on a sensor
        Parameters:
        aSensorId - the sensor to set the value of
        aError - the error message to raise on sensor or null to clear
        Throws:
        org.netkernel.layer0.nkf.NKFException - if sensor doesn't exist

      • incrementSensor

        java.lang.Number incrementSensor(java.lang.String aSensorId)
                          throws org.netkernel.layer0.nkf.NKFException
        Increment the value of a sensor by one
        Parameters:
        aSensorId - the sensor to set the value of
        Returns:
        the updated value
        Throws:
        org.netkernel.layer0.nkf.NKFException - if sensor doesn't exist or current sensor value isn't a Long or Integer

      • getScriptState

        java.lang.Object getScriptState(java.lang.String aStatePath,
                                java.lang.Object aDefault)
                         throws org.netkernel.layer0.nkf.NKFException
        Get the value of a script state variable
        Parameters:
        aStatePath - XPath into state document, for example "var1" or "sub/var1"
        aDefault - the value to return if no state exists on the given path
        Throws:
        org.netkernel.layer0.nkf.NKFException

        Set the value of a script state variable
        Parameters:
        aStatePath - XPath into state document, for example "var1" or "sub/var1"
        aValue - the value to set the state variable to
        Throws:
        org.netkernel.layer0.nkf.NKFException

      • callScriptById

        java.lang.Object callScriptById(java.lang.String aId,
                                java.lang.Object... aArgs)
                         throws org.netkernel.layer0.nkf.NKFException
        Call another script
        Parameters:
        aId - id of script to call
        aArgs - matched pairs of String argument names and Object argument values
        Returns:
        response representation from other script
        Throws:
        org.netkernel.layer0.nkf.NKFException - if other script can't be found or fails

        java.lang.Object callScriptByName(java.lang.String aName,
                                  java.lang.Object... aArgs)
                           throws org.netkernel.layer0.nkf.NKFException
        Call another script
        Parameters:
        aName - full name of script to call
        aArgs - matched pairs of String argument names and Object argument values
        Returns:
        response representation from other script
        Throws:
        org.netkernel.layer0.nkf.NKFException - if other script can't be found or fails

      • createQuery

        IPolestarQuery createQuery(java.lang.String aSensorId,
                           QueryType aType)
        Execute a query on a given sensor
        Parameters:
        aSensorId - sensor to query
        aType - type of query to perform
        Returns:
        a query to further refine or execute

      • analogueChangeDetect

        boolean[] analogueChangeDetect(double value,
                               double falseThreshold,
                               double trueThreshold,
                               java.lang.String aStatePath)
                        throws org.netkernel.layer0.nkf.NKFException
        Detect changes in an analog value rising and falling below a trigger level with hysteresis
        Parameters:
        value - input value to test
        falseThreshold - outside this value result will be false
        trueThreshold - outside this value result will be true
        aStatePath - XPath into state document to store state, for example "var1" or "sub/var1"
        Returns:
        a two element boolean array, first value is if value is in in true threshold, second value is true only when result changes
        Throws:
        org.netkernel.layer0.nkf.NKFException

      • booleanChangeDetect

        boolean[] booleanChangeDetect(boolean value,
                              long falseDelay,
                              long trueDelay,
                              java.lang.String aStatePath)
                       throws org.netkernel.layer0.nkf.NKFException
        Detect changes in a boolean value with time hysteresis
        Parameters:
        value - input value
        falseDelay - value must have been false for at least this long before it can become true
        trueDelay - value must have been true for at least this long before it can become false
        aStatePath - XPath into state document to store state, for example "var1" or "sub/var1"
        Returns:
        a two element boolean array, first value is if value is the output value, second value is true only when output value changes
        Throws:
        org.netkernel.layer0.nkf.NKFException

      • atMostEvery

        boolean atMostEvery(long period,
                    boolean requireQuiet,
                    java.lang.String aStatePath)
             throws org.netkernel.layer0.nkf.NKFException
        Only trigger a true at most once every period
        Parameters:
        period - the period in milliseconds
        requireQuiet - if true then period is reset each time and will only return true if no calls for at least the period
        aStatePath - XPath into state document to store state, for example "var1" or "sub/var1"
        Returns:
        true if triggered
        Throws:
        org.netkernel.layer0.nkf.NKFException
